meanings.definition: relating to or denoting a prosthesis
meanings.sent1: The prosthetic arm helped him pick up objects easily.
meanings.sent2: She received a prosthetic leg after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The prosthetic hand waved back at him playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her prosthetic smile didn't quite reach her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The prosthetic heart symbolized his resilience and strength.

meanings.definition: a prosthesis, especially an artificial limb or other body part
meanings.sent1: He relied on a prosthetic to walk comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's prosthetic allowed him to run again.
meanings.sent3: The cat's prosthetic tail wagged happily as it played.
meanings.sent4: Her prosthetic wings carried her to new heights of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's prosthetic arm was a testament to modern technology.
